AUTHOR: kagami#6142
NAME: GNU
DESCRIPTION:
An attempt to emulate some common GNU utilities.
You can pipe (e.g. !grep -i google http://news.google.com | !wc)
You can redirect output to pastebin (e.g. !cat @chat > chatlog)
Pastebin API key is required for pastebin redirect. Set it with !pastebin [api_key].
